The womans advocate shewing the reason according to Scripture or the scripture reason why God hath brought to light the true meaning of his word by an unexpected hand. Marsin, M.
12, [4] p.
Sold by J. Clark ..., [London] : 1697.
Caption title. Attributed to M. Marsin by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints. Signed at end: M.M. Place of publication suggested by Wing. Imprint from colophon. Reproductions of original in the Harvard University Library. Bound with: "Some of the chief heads of the most miraculous wonders that have late been in Christendom" [4] p. (Wing M813CB).
=======
The womans advocate shewing the reason according to Scripture or the scripture reason why God hath brought to light the true meaning of his word by an unexpected hand. Marsin, M.
12, [4] p.
Sold by J. Clark ..., [London] : 1697.
Caption title. Attributed to M. Marsin by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints. Signed at end: M.M. Place of publication suggested by Wing. Imprint from colophon. Reproductions of original in the Harvard University Library. Bound with: "Some of the chief heads of the most miraculous wonders that have late been in Christendom" [4] p. (Wing M813CB).
